Test Name: Immunoglobulin G (IgG) Heavy and Light Chain (HLC) Kappa and Lambda Ratio
Purpose: To analyze IgG kappa and lambda HLC pairs and their ratio for the diagnosis and monitoring of monoclonal gammopathy, multiple myeloma, and related disorders.
Container: Plain tube, clot activator tube, or lithium heparin tube
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Siemens BN II, Roche Cobas)
